value.0:
DESCRIPTION:
One of the rarest and most coveted gems, its the most valuble form of the mineral chrysoberyl. Alexandrite takes on a brilliant green hue when under indirect sunlight but turns blood-red when exposed to candlelight.
 

LORE:
Alexandrite is commonly said to enhance the rebirth of inner and outer self and to promote awareness.
Some loretellers claim that all alexandrites comes from the body of the oldest son of Silvanus, the Forest Father. A common nursery rhyme goes "Silvanus' wife went mad one night, murdering her child by candlelight."
